creator: SK SoftTech
descriptionHtml:
The borderlight live wallpaper app adds beautifully curved round corners to your device. Set astonishing round light rgb to your home or lock screen. Edge lighting makes your mobile totally adorable and attractive.

Want to see a beautiful lighting experience over other apps? This Edge lighting app does it for you. Edge lighting app is different from other wallpaper borders app. With just a single click you can set edge light border wallpaper. Believe us, a boundary light bar will make your device completely astonishing. You can customize the wallpaper border to fit it to your device screen. Round corners can also be tailored according to your device size and width.

Easily manageable notch settings to personalize live wallpaper lighting app. It lets you select the border light color of your choice. It’s time to revolutionize the look and feel of your phone with Edge Light Border Live Wallpapers. Add smooth cornered live light to your screen. Adjust the round light rgb color, style and width. Apart from adding light corners, the app consumes minimal battery resources. Don’t worry about battery usage while setting light wallpaper. Convenient setting options to modify the thickness of the border.

Change the current boring look of your phone with the border-light live wallpaper app. Decorate your mobile and make it different from everyone. Impress your friends and family with lighting app. Set your favorite color border to make your screen appealing. Yes, of course you can set any background image along with edge light border wallpaper.

Marvelous edge light border wallpaper app has a simple and intuitive interface. Pick out your favorite borderline color. Edge lighting app contains different designs such as emoji, flower, heart etc. Imagine how beautiful your device will look with moving gradients. Personalize your lock and home screen with magical lighting. Moving borders with animated effects customize to fit any screen.
Key Features of Edge Light Border Live Wallpaper.
1. Adjust edge lighting width.
2. Options to choose animation style.
3. Adjust round light corners to your preference.
4. Modify thickness according to your wish.
5. Option to choose borderlight style like heart, emoji, flower etc.
6. Custom-built notch height and width.
7. Alter thickness of round corners as per your preference.
8. Brightness adjuster.
9. Set wallpaper of your choice in between the round light corners.
10. Multiple cool frames and formats.
11. Set opacity of edge lighting.
12. Simple and user-friendly interface.
13. Set radius of border light corners.
14. Compatible for multiple screens such as Infinity U, V, O, Display notch etc.
15. Completely FREE.

Display of colorful border light live wallpaper will make you adore your phone. Apply wonderful edge lighting and impress your social circle. Various round light rgb hues will enhance the beauty of your phone.

In short, Edge Light Border Live app provides everything to beautify your phone. Download this app and share it with your friends and family.

If you have any suggestions then shoot them in the comments box. We would love to hear from you.

Don’t forget to rate us!
descriptionShort: Everything to beautify your phone with colorful border-light live wallpaper

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
> Edge lighting live wallpaper
> Dark theme
> Efficient and no performance lost
> Free and easy to use
